meta.name: description
meta.content: Hyde Leadership Charter School strives to develop the deeper character and unique potential of each student in Brooklyn, NY.

figcaption.h3: I learn the most about myself by facing challenges and taking risks
I am a leader through asking the best of myself and the best of others.
I am responsible for my own learning.

h2.span: I need a challenging and supportive community to develop my character

figcaption.h3: I am gifted with a unique potential and conscience is my guide to discovering it.

div.div: Hyde Leadership Charter School - Brooklyn's mission is to develop the deeper character and unique potential of each student. Using the Hyde process of family-based character education, Hyde-Brooklyn will unite parents, teachers and students in helping each student achieve his or her best academically and in sports, the arts, and service to the community.

li.span: Points scored above District 19 schools in Math
Points scored above District 19 schools in ELA
Students performed at Level 3 and Level 4 in Science.
